tags: Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Fertility Treatment,
review:
Great Experience!! I met Dr. Bhawana Mishra upon one of our friend‚Äôs suggestion and I‚Äôm very pleased with my choice to have her as my Gynecologist.
She is one of the most professional Doctors I‚Äôve ever met. What differentiates her from others is her emotional capabilities. 
After two miscarriages and difficulty in conceiving we had lost all the hopes. She gave us a ray of hope and guided me with invaluable suggestions which helped me to conceive and have a smooth delivery. It would have not been possible without her guidance. My pregnancy was a complicated one, but she was there for me all the times like a mother, very caring and compassionate. She always took time to listen to my health needs and answered all my questions (even silly doubtsÔÅä). Few qualities of her which I really want to appreciate and accentuate are:
‚Ä¢	Professionalism- Exceptionally good in her field *** ********* ***** ********* ** ********* ****** ** ***********‚Ä¢	Empathy ‚Äì Which is rare to see these days. A great listener and genuinely concerned about her patient‚Äôs well-being. You can share all your doubts and fear without any hesitation.
‚Ä¢	Availability ‚Äì She makes sure that you can get in touch with her when needed (you can text her when facing any issue and will surely get reply from her). 
‚Ä¢	She always tries to avoid unnecessary medicines.

Icing on the cake was clinic staffs, very polite and helpful. I can say this was the best experience I have had in a clinic.

Mam we are so fortunate to find you. Thank you for all your help and for not giving up on me! I really appreciate it! Thank you!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After consulting a number of ob- gyns and just not finding the right one , my husband and I did a thorough search and chanced upon Dr Bhawana Mishra . Reading the glowing reviews gave us hope that this Dr could just be the one. From the get go Dr Bhawana was like a breath of fresh air , with her calm demeanor and beaming smile . I felt comfortable and confident in her  . She calmed my fears , addressed all my concerns and cleared my doubts without rushing through the appointment . My pregnancy was anything but painless  , I had different symptoms almost every week and Dr Bhawana treated me with utmost patience and care . Whenever I had any uncomfortable symptoms I would msg her and she would reply in a jiffy. Her medicines would always work like magic for me and she made my pregnancy journey as comfortable as possible . During my delivery she came back from her vacation and performed my C section . Seeing her at the operation theatre I knew I was in good hands and my C section couldn't have gone smoother , it was over before I even knew it . I've never met a doctor who is a perfect combination of patient and professional with a  profound love for her patients. I will definitely miss my monthly appointments with Dr Bhawana and would highly recommend her to anyone looking for an Ob-gyn.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all I would like to mention that Dr. Bhawana is the best Doctor I have met in my whole life. She is so polite, friendly and patient with all your concerns. I met her for my pregnancy and she just made me feel so comfortable. I felt that I was talking to my family member , she explains everything in such layman term and day to day concerns that you feel that you are in safe hands. I have such beautiful memories the way she would explain everything and give examples of her pregnancy and her family members. And top it all how can I forget that beautiful smile of hers , brings you peace. She was available anytime we needed her. I never really said enough of thank you to her to make my pregnancy journey so beautiful. Would like to use this platform to do so , Heart felt thank you Doctor. You are a blessing. Will come to see you soon :).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Bhawana is a great doctor whom we had been consulting since we found out that my wife is pregnant. We had just been blessed with a healthy baby girl. Dr. Bhawana had been very supportive, patient and positive and tries to instill positivity in her patients also when they are tensed. She did thorough diagnosis and treatment of every problem we faced and clarified all doubts we had. My wife got gestational diabetes during pregnancy but Dr. Bhawana kept it under check right from beginning and did not let it become a major problem. We would recommend her to all for pregnancy and delivery consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First of all one should be blessed to be treated by her. ******* *** **** ** ********* * ****** **** *** ** **** I was introduced to her by my friend divya and my second pregnancy resulted in a blighted ovum and eventually a miscarriage. I was devastated but the way She consoled was like my own mother and also the way she filled up confidence in our lives, hats off. I was very happy with her and after 6 months I conceived again and the pregnancy was smooth *** *** ******* ********* *********** *********** *** *********** ****** ***** **** *ny issue she is easily accessible over a call, has a great team as well. Wonderful person who takes care of each patient like her own child. She totally shares her life experience Nd her knowledge on pregnancy related subjects and makes us super comfortable. I and my husband are extremely fond of her for the person she is *** ***** *** *** **** ****** who delivered my baby. 

Regards, 
Savitha and Rishank :)
reply_text: Thank you so much dear savitha.. Much humbled.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: she is so understanding and well communicative doctor I have seen, anytime we can reach her n she helps us in all the ways how much she can. And I would like to suggest others also if you need a wonderful doctor for any of your maternity care and you are looking for good doctor then don't think of twice just go ahead with Dr. Bhawana Mishra the wonderful doctor, and I am sure u will feel very happy after meeting her. Thanks a lot for Dr.Bhawana mam during my critical days all over my 9 months 2nd pregnancy she has just taken care of me so well everytime and on September 9th I delivered healthy baby boy through normal delivery and it's a wonderful gift from God as well as from doctor, and we are so happy for it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are very happy that we chose Bhawana Mishra to help us through our journey of pregnancy. We are very happy with the doctor friendliness and professionalism. She helped us understanding every step of pregnency from pregnancy test till delivery. She took the full responsibility till delivery which is rare to see these days. She never scared us for the normal abnormal things that happen during the pregnancy. She always suggested only the required medication without overdoing it. More than anything else she promotes and tries her best for Normal Delivery. Our little one was born naturally with the help of safe hands of Bhawana Mishra. Thank you Bhawana madam!Shruti & Kiran

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I was really very lucky to find Dr Bhawana and Dr Sunil to look after my and my baby throughout my pregnancy. They are a perfect team. All the staff at Aikya are extremely understanding and supportive. They not only took care of my pregnancy but also supported me mentally and eased all my fears. Dr Bhawana took care of me like a mother. They treat you like family.  I faces some complications post delivery but Dr Bhawana and Dr Sunil took care of all the problems and helped me recover also supported me to tackle post delivery blues. I am really thankful to have had Dr Bhawana, Dr Sunil and Rekha during and after my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy to share that I have delivered healthy baby via planned c section.And I am satisfied that I  was getting treatment under Dr.Bhawna .********* *** **** ********* ** *** ***** *I was given proper treatment throughout my pregnancy so that me and my baby should be healthy at the time of delivery.I want to thank Dr.Bhawna ,Dr.Sunil Eshwar and all the staff of Aikya  clinic and will strongly recommend them .
